about_the_game:
"Trick or Treat! Pumpkin Knight - Befana

The Pumpkin Swordsman, who uses the power of all demons, has appeared in the City of Time and Eternity! Invite Pumpkin Swordsman Befana to join your team, scare off the enemies, help your friends with the power of a thousand ghosts, and most importantly, turn all your opponents into pumpkins!

Content:
New Hero.
Befana
The pumpkin swordsman who travels from Aenor to the city of time and eternity. In order to cross the sea of fog across the two worlds, Befana through the power of the magical pumpkin, which allows her to have the ability to turn others into pumpkins, and become a pumpkin swordsman using the power of all ghosts.

Hero skills profile.
Trick or treat: change the target into a small pumpkin, the target will lose all its original abilities.


Befana exclusive occupation.
Pumpkin Knight
The special swordsman who uses the power of all ghosts, in addition to having a range of skills to repel enemies, but also can use the magic of pumpkin magic to lift the negative effects on the target. Do not give candy on the trick, pumpkin Viva!


Skill introduction.
Terror Pumpkin: Send a pumpkin shock wave to the front diamond-shaped area, causing physical damage and knocking back all targets in the area.
Smiling Pumpkin: Remove the negative effects from the target, long live the pumpkin!

Occupational Set (Banquet of Ghosts).
Set effect [Halloween Carnival]: Physical damage +100
Halloween pumpkin head: head equipment, physical hit rate +10
Halloween cloak: body equipment, physical evasion rate +10, magic evasion rate +10
Halloween Lantern: Hand equipment, +10 Mist Resistance
Halloween candy: ornamental equipment, +10 burst rate

short_description: The pumpkin swordsman with the power of all ghosts has appeared in the City of Time and Eternity! Invite the pumpkin swordsman Befana to join your team, scare off the enemies, help your friends with the power of all ghosts, and then, most importantly, turn all your opponents into pumpkins!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Russian
